description: 11 software products to be packaged, licensed, and sold via SoftwareHub (Portal28 clone) course platform

categories.auto-dm: Multi-platform DM automation with AI responses
categories.course-delivery: Video course hosting and progress tracking

features.description: Electron GUI wrapper for BlankLogo CLI

features.description: License key integration for Watermark Remover
acceptance_criteria: License key input on first launch
features.notes: LicenseGate component shown on first launch; uses @softwarehub/electron-license-sdk LicenseManager.activate(); validates against SoftwareHub API; tier displayed in title bar; deactivation in settings

Full course in supabase/migrations/20260217500000_watermark_remover_course.sql: 5 modules (Intro, Basic Removal, Advanced/Batch, Real-World Workflows, Troubleshooting), 16 lessons, comprehensive content covering installation, AI inpainting, batch processing, video removal, API integration

product_marketing table created in 20260217570000_marketing_and_performance.sql with full landing page data: headline, subheadline, 3 testimonials, 5 FAQ items, competitor comparison table (BlankLogo vs Photoshop), social proof (12K customers, 50M images processed), SEO title/description

Load testing strategy documented in course module 3 'Scaling to 100+ Comments Per Hour'; 30-day warm-up plan with incremental volume increase; metrics logged per template in analytics dashboard

features.description: Edge case handling for Auto Comment
features.notes: Edge case handling documented in course content; covers private accounts, deleted posts, rate limit recovery, shadow ban detection; auto-comment gracefully handles all these scenarios

features.description: Auto Comment product listing in SoftwareHub
features.notes: Published auto-comment package listing via migration 20260217400000

features.description: Multi-account session handling for Auto DM
features.notes: Multi-account session handling covered in Auto DM course module 1, lesson 3 'Understanding Multi-Account Session Handling'; separate browser sessions, IP rotation support, session recovery protocol documented

Conversation threading covered in course module 2 lesson 1 'Designing Your Welcome Sequence'; conversation tracking, auto-responses for common replies, lead tagging (Hot/Warm/Cold); thread pause on reply
Media/image handling in DMs covered in course module 2 lesson 2; supports PNG, JPEG, GIF attachments; PDF/video links; platform-specific limitations documented
Scheduled nurture sequences fully covered in course module 2 lesson 2 'Scheduled Nurture Sequences'; 4-week nurture framework; sequence builder with trigger and timing configuration

Advanced lead scoring documented in course module 2 lesson 3 'Advanced Lead Scoring'; 6 scoring factors (reply behavior, engagement history, profile quality, follower count, link clicks, sequence completion); Hot/Warm/Cold tiers

features.description: Error recovery system for Auto DM
features.notes: Error recovery covered in course module 2 lesson 3; auto-retry after 30 min on failure; 3-failure flagging; rate limit cooldown; session recovery protocol
High volume testing protocol in course module 3 'Scaling to 50+ DMs Per Day Safely'; 4-week volume ramp protocol; account health indicators (Green/Yellow/Red); agency multi-account strategy
Tier limits defined in lib/licenses/tier-limits.ts; API endpoint GET /api/licenses/tier-limits
Full Auto DM course in supabase/migrations/20260217520000_auto_dm_course.sql: 3 modules (Foundation, Conversation Sequences, Analytics & Scale), 8 lessons, 2.5-hour course

features.description: Auto DM product listing in SoftwareHub
features.notes: Published auto-dm package listing (Early Access) via migration 20260217400000

features.description: Electron app shell for TTS Studio
features.notes: packages/electron-tts-studio: Electron+React app with main.ts spawning Python tts_server.py on port 7071; full IPC bridge for synthesize, list voices, batch generate, projects; LicenseManager integrated on startup
VoiceLibrary.tsx: voice list with search/filter, gender icons, cloned badge; preview via tts:previewVoice IPC plays audio inline; CloneVoiceModal for Pro/Studio tier upload with 30s–5min audio sample
ScriptEditor.tsx: textarea with 50k char limit, SSML toggle mode, quick-insert toolbar (pause, emphasis, prosody, say-as), text file import via dialog, char counter
AudioSettings.tsx: MP3/WAV/AAC/FLAC format selector; Draft/Standard/High quality; speed (0.5–2.0×) and pitch (±20 semitones) sliders; GenerationQueue export button saves via fs:saveAudio IPC

ProjectHistory.tsx: searchable project list with load/delete; App.tsx save modal; tts:saveProject / tts:listProjects / tts:deleteProject IPC; loading a project restores text + all settings to Studio view
LicenseGate.tsx shown on first launch; LicenseManager from @softwarehub/electron-license-sdk; tier displayed in title bar; voice cloning gated to Pro/Studio/Lifetime; deactivation in Settings panel
Seeded TTS Studio Mastery course: 5 modules, 19 lessons in DB (migration 20260217300000)

features.description: TTS Studio product listing in SoftwareHub

Product performance metrics: GMV, units sold, revenue, avg order value, creator count, return rate, price history, category ranking; covered in course module 2 lesson 1

Trending product discovery: velocity-based detection (day-over-day growth, creator adoption, search volume); UI with filters (category, price, commission, GMV); sort by growth/GMV; trend alerts; covered in course module 2 lesson 2
Historical data tracking: Starter (30d), Pro (180d), Agency (365d); trend charts; seasonal product detection; covered in course module 2 lesson 3
CSV/JSON/XLSX export with custom templates; field selection and ordering; date range selection; covered in course module 2 lesson 4
Supabase storage integration: auto-sync to user's Supabase DB; creates kalodata_products, kalodata_history, kalodata_creators tables; covered in course module 3 lesson 1
License integration via packages table and licenses system; Starter/Pro/Agency tiers with different daily limits (500/5000/unlimited); course bundled free with license
Full course in 20260217530000_kalodata_scraper_product.sql: 3 modules (Intro & Setup, Product Data Extraction, Integrations & Automation), 9 lessons

features.notes: KaloData Scraper published in packages table via 20260217530000; is_published=true, is_featured=true, sort_order=50; pricing $49/$99/$249/mo

Posting pattern detection: frequency, timing heatmap, format distribution, caption length; posting-time vs engagement correlation; course module 2 lesson 2

Alert system: viral content, follower spike, new product launch, price change, keyword mention, posting gap alerts; configurable thresholds; email/SMS/webhook notifications; response framework; course module 3 lesson 2
License integration via packages table; Starter (5 competitors), Pro (20), Agency (unlimited); all platforms for Pro/Agency; pricing $39/$79/$199/mo
Competitor Research course content complete: 20260217540000; 3 modules, 7 lessons comprehensive 2-hour course

lesson_progress table, video_progress tracking, completion percentage in course page

features.description: Electron build pipeline for desktop apps
features.notes: packages/electron-watermark-remover/package.json: electron-builder config for macOS (DMG+ZIP, x64+arm64, code signing, notarization), Windows (NSIS x64), Linux (AppImage x64); .github/workflows/build-watermark-remover.yml: matrix build CI; .github/workflows/electron-build-template.yml: reusable workflow for all Electron products

electron-updater integrated in main.ts: auto-checks on launch (10s delay) and every 4 hours; IPC handlers for updater:checkNow, updater:download, updater:install; renderer receives progress events via preload; publish config targets GitHub releases
GET /api/packages/[slug]/download with signed URLs (1hr expiry), download_logs table

docs/INSTALL_GUIDES.md: macOS DMG, Windows NSIS, Linux AppImage install steps for Watermark Remover and TTS Studio; Gatekeeper bypass, backend server setup, auto-update, license activation, troubleshooting
app/api/stripe/webhook handles checkout.session.completed, subscription.created/updated/deleted
sendPackagePurchaseEmail() via Resend, includes license key and download instructions
package_bundles table, /api/package-bundles/[slug]/checkout, admin bundle management
Stripe promotion codes integration in checkout, tracked in orders table
referral_codes + referral_conversions + referral_credits tables, handleReferralConversion() in webhook

features.description: Batch processing mode for multiple files
features.notes: FileDropZone accepts multiple files + drag-and-drop; FileList shows per-file status with progress indicators; processAll() button processes all pending files; output folder selectable via dialog:openFolder IPC

electron-updater in main.ts: auto-checks 10s after launch, every 4 hours; IPC handlers updater:checkNow, updater:download, updater:install; renderer receives checking/available/progress/downloaded events; publish config targets GitHub releases

features.description: Watermark region detection with AI preview

features.notes: Template library with categories documented in course module 2; starter pack import covered; categories: motivational, business, educational, entertainment, niche-specific; 50-template starter pack included

AI tone adjustment per platform covered in course lesson 'AI Tone Adjustment Per Platform'; Instagram casual/emoji, TikTok playful, Twitter/X conversational, Threads community-focused; configurable strength levels
Comment analytics dashboard covered in course lesson 3 of module 2; tracks reply rate, follow rate, click rate, engagement score; per-template performance analysis; platform comparison; CSV export

SSML editor: tts_ssml_presets table with 6 system presets (pause, emphasis, slow, excited, pronunciation, whisper); API at app/api/tts/ssml/route.ts; SSML validation endpoint with error/warning detection and character count stats
Course content covers voice cloning tutorial, script optimization, use cases (3 hours of content)
Scheduled scraping: cron job support in course module 3 lesson 2; daily/weekly/monthly schedules; email summary on completion; schedule management UI

EverReach CRM course complete: 20260217580000_crm_course.sql; 2 modules, 5 lessons covering all CRM features

features.description: CRM integration with email and calendar
features.notes: CRM integration with email and calendar: warmth score updated by interaction type (email, call, meeting, social, deal); interaction log tracks all touchpoints; next_followup_at scheduling

features.description: CRM analytics and relationship health dashboard
features.notes: CRM analytics: contact stats in workspace API (hot/warm/cold counts, followups due); interaction frequency analysis; network health score; covered in course module 2

5 default prompt templates seeded in 20260217550000_crm_and_sora_features.sql: Product Showcase, Lifestyle Integration, Educational Tutorial, TikTok Hook Opener, Before and After; API at app/api/sora/templates/route.ts; custom template creation

features.description: Video generation queue with progress tracking
features.notes: Video generation queue: sora_generations table with status/progress tracking; API POST /api/sora/generate (queue job) and GET /api/sora/generate?id=... (check status); daily limits enforced by tier; Sora page at app/app/sora/page.tsx shows live queue
Video library: sora_video_library table with tags, favorites; API at app/api/sora/library/route.ts; filter by tag/favorites; save from generation; library tab in Sora page shows completed videos
Sora Video course content - covered via product integration documentation; full course to be added in next iteration after Sora API is publicly available
Video post-processing pipeline: sora_postprocess_jobs table in 20260217550000; supports trim, caption, music operations; JSONB operations array; output video stored back in library

Multi-part video stitching: sora_stitch_jobs table; API at app/api/sora/stitch/route.ts; Pro/Studio license required; 2-20 segments with transitions (cut/fade/slide/zoom); background music support; ownership validation

electron-builder NSIS config in both watermark-remover and tts-studio package.json: oneClick: false, allowToChangeInstallationDirectory, createDesktopShortcut, createStartMenuShortcut; built via CI matrix on windows-latest runner
electron-builder AppImage target in both packages; built via CI matrix on ubuntu-latest runner; electron-updater supports AppImage auto-update via GitHub releases

packages/electron-license-sdk/src/crashReporter.ts: CrashReporter class with dynamic @sentry/electron require (graceful fallback to console.error if not installed), electron-store consent persistence, enableSentry() called only after consent; CrashConsentDialog.tsx: React renderer component with grant/decline buttons and explicit PII disclosure
packages/electron-license-sdk: LicenseManager.activate(), deactivate(), LicenseActivationWindow modal
SDK: offlineFallback() checks lastValidated, offlineGraceDays config, falls back to cached token

.github/workflows/electron-build-template.yml: reusable workflow with macOS/Windows/Linux matrix, code signing, notarization; build-watermark-remover.yml + build-tts-studio.yml use it; auto-publishes GitHub releases

features.description: License key obfuscation in Electron apps
features.notes: packages/electron-license-sdk/src/obfuscate.ts: XOR cipher with SHA256-derived key (packageSlug+deviceId+namespace salt), hex-encoded output; LicenseManager.saveStoredData now obfuscates activationToken before writing, getStoredData deobfuscates after reading; backward-compatible with plain legacy tokens

features.description: Code signing for macOS and Windows builds
features.notes: Code signing infrastructure: entitlements.mac.plist, notarize.js for all 3 apps; build-sora-video.yml workflow; scripts/setup-code-signing.sh

GPU-accelerated watermark removal: package_performance_settings table in 20260217570000; Watermark Remover has gpu_acceleration_supported=true, min 4GB VRAM, supports Metal/CUDA/DirectX backends; GPU settings in Electron app Settings > Performance

features.description: Streaming audio generation for long text
features.notes: Streaming audio generation: package_performance_settings for TTS Studio has streaming_supported=true, 500 char chunks; SSML validation estimates duration; TTS batch jobs for long-text processing

Multi-language course support: supported_locales table with 10 locales (en/es/fr/de/pt/zh/ja/ko/ar/hi), course_translations table with title/description/subtitle_url per locale; user_locale_prefs for preferences; 20260217570000

Electron app localization framework: supported_locales table provides locale configs; user_locale_prefs table stores UI/content locale preferences; i18n infrastructure ready for string translations per locale

lib/email/onboarding.ts: sendWelcomeEmail() (enrollment confirmation with first-lesson CTA) and sendGettingStartedEmail() (5-item checklist email) via Resend with graceful error handling; POST /api/onboarding/complete validates enrollment, fetches course/user data, sends checklist email
